mapper.insert: insert into `order` (order_id, strategy_id, exchange_type, type, symbol, symbol_type, price, amount, filled_amount, avg_price, fee, created, `open`, closed, `status`) value (#{orderId}, #{strategyId}, #{exchangeType}, #{type}, #{symbol}, #{symbolType}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{filledAmount}, #{avgPrice}, #{fee}, #{created}, #{open}, #{closed}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from `order` where closed is null and strategy_id = #{strategyId}

select `type`, count(id) as `count`, SUM(10*amount/avg_price) as avg, SUM(amount*avg_price)/SUM(amount) as price from `order` where strategy_id = #{id} and status = 'CLOSED' and `closed` > #{sessionStart} group by `type`;
select count(*) from `order` where strategy_id = #{id} and status = 'CLOSED' and `closed` > #{sessionStart} and `type` = #{orderType}
select SUM(10*amount/avg_price) from `order` where strategy_id = #{id} and status = 'CLOSED' and `closed` > #{sessionStart} and `type` = #{type} limit #{first}, #{count}
